duties_responsibilities.duty: Review customer and Bank transactions with accuracy, speed, efficiency, and professionalism to meet the superior quality service and delivery standards of the Bank.
Analysis of outgoing wire transfer documentation to ensure compliance with policy and procedure guidelines.
Screen wire transfer requests and analyze for potential fraud and/or suspicious activity.
Provide technical and operational support to multiple business units.
Maintain current knowledge of federal and state laws and regulations, along with the Bank’s policies and procedures.
Minimize/eliminate audit exceptions and possible loss situations through timely and effective escalation and training.
Collaborate with other department employees regarding processing and efficiency improvements.

education_certification.credential: 3+ years of Branch Operations experience required.
Experience with Wire Transfers, Self-Payment request, and Banking Support line required.
